description: Awful app! Royally screwed up my Ubuntu 18.04 system and wouldn't work. I'm having issues removing the Front end. If I could I would give it zero stars.

Used this installer and all worked like a charme !
Using mythtv for over 6 years now to record videos from Satelite.
Description makes it sound like it will install MythTV, it will only change settings for an already installed and working MythTV setup. It will also not uninstall easily. Should be removed.
Consider installing MythTV using Mythbuntu Control Panel (https://www.mythtv.org/wiki/Mythbuntu_Control_Panel) with the Mythbuntu MythTV Updates PPA.

I've been using MythTV for over a decade, but the installation process is horrible, and now it's worse. The all important feature to get schedule data from Schedules Direct is no longer built-in. Following Wiki procedure to install XMLTV fails too. The backend configuration interface is awkward, inconsistent and buggy. I wanted to upgrade to this version - hoping for improvements, but this is unusable. Perhaps with many days of tinkering and Googling for answers might help, but it shouldn't be that hard. Mythbuntu was better but now sadly discontinued. It's software that only works for developers of the software - not users.
summary: After decades of development it's still a nightmare

description: It can break your system - cannot remove it. Dependencies are missing.
Lässt sich nach der Umstellung auf Snap mit 20.04 nicht deinstallieren. Habe es mit meiner DVB-C Karte nie zum Laufen bekommen.
summary: Lässt sich aufgrund von Abhängigkeiten nicht deinstallieren

description: Neuinstallation scheitert an fehlender Verbindung zu Mysql, wenn man das behoben hat, dann an fehlender Verbindung vom Frontend zum Backend (und das alles auf einem Rechner). Die grund Idee ist gut, die Umsetzung leider katatrophal .(Mit Ubuntu 20.04 + MySQL 8.0.23 keinen Erfolg gehabt)
summary: immer wieder die gleichen Probleme mit MythTV

description:
I can't unterstand some of the critical votings. As a newbie to MythTV I installed V32 from official repository sources with apt and after a smooth setup in 30 min. it was running completely error free.

Th only hard work was initial DVB-S channel scanning, which didn't get any channels first. 

But now all works fine, only little bugs in mythTV frontend.
ne fonctionne met le pc en veille et impossible à désinstaller .
